ygData.subject: RE: Cocktails at 20
ygData.msgSnippet: he drops them about every other time.  bring a couple friends you can t solo him, even kiting cause you will probably run into the level 40ish seafury cyclops
ygData.messageBody:
he drops them about every other time. bring a couple friends you can't solo
him, even kiting cause you will probably run into the level 40ish seafury
cyclops guys roaming the island. plus if lull doesn't work you will pull
some of his pirate friends. the captain with the bracer is about level 20
to 22, and backstabs for 90s.

Shada

>
>
> How tough is the halfling that carries the bracers? Can a 21
> bard solo him
> or do I need some help? Also, does he always drop them or is
> it random?
>
> Thanks
> Galtin of E'ci
>
